XXvtrksopu:90: jāto nāmāśrayo nānyaś cetasāṃ tasya vastunaḥ /

XXvtrksopu:104: anyārthaṃ kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā draṣṭavyā /
XXvtrksopu:106: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamād ṛte /

XXvtrksopu:109: sarvapratyayānāṃ śabdānugatarūpatve sati kasyacid api jñānasyārthasākṣātkaraṇayogāt /

XXvtrksopu:122: buddhyāvasīyate sāpi pratyakṣatvena saṃmatā // ity anena vikalpasyāpi pratyakṣatvam iṣṭam

XXvtrksopu:124: yadi kalpanātmakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syād arthasākṣātkaritaiva hīyeta iti//
XXvtrksopu:132: yadi hy avisaṃvāditāmātreṇa pramāṇaṃ syāt keśoṇḍukādijñāne 'pi ālokādeḥ saṃvādasaṃbhavāt tad api pramāṇaṃ syāt //
XXvtrksopu:137: sarvacittacaittānām ātmā saṃvedyate yena rūpeṇa tat svasaṃvedanam /
XXvtrksopu:138: yogaḥ śamathaḥ prajñā yeṣām asti te yoginaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:141: prakāracatuṣṭayākhyānena yair indriyam eva draṣṭṛ kalpitaṃ mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvitaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ nābhyupagataṃ yogijñānaṃ ca yogina eva na santi kutas teṣāṃ jñānam iti te sarve nirastā bhavanti //
XXvtrksopu:142: 12. tathā hi vaibhāṣikais tāvaj jñānasyāpratighatvād yadi tad draṣṭṛ syād
XXvtrksopu:143: tadā vyavahitam api gṛhṇīyād itīndriyaṃ draṣṭṛ kalpitaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:145: / yadi hi jñānaṃ gatvārthaṃ gṛhṇāti tadā gamanavibandhakābhāvād vyavahitam api gṛhṇīyād iti yujyate vaktum /
XXvtrksopu:147: yadākāraṃ taj jñānam utpadyate tat tena gṛhītam ity ucyate na cāyogyadeśastho 'rthas tatsarūpakaḥ
XXvtrksopu:148: tat kathaṃ tasya tena grahaṇaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:150: yadīndriyaṃ draṣṭṛ syāt tadā kācādivyavahitasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ na syāt /
XXvtrksopu:161: tad api svaviṣayakṣaṇopādeyasajātīyakṣaṇasahitenendriyajñānena yaj janitam ity anenaiva nirastam

XXvtrksopu:168: vyāpriyamāṇe punar etasmin yat pratyakṣaṃ tac ced anindriyajaṃ kim anyad indriyajaṃ bhaviṣyati
XXvtrksopu:169: na ca nimīlitākṣasya rūpadarśanābhāvād anubhavaviruddhatvam āśaṅkanīyam /
XXvtrksopu:171: 14. kim arthaṃ tarhy etad upanyastam iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:173: yat tat siddhānte mānasam uktaṃ tad yady evaṃlakṣaṇaṃ syād tadā na kaścit parokto doṣa ity ādarśayitum /
XXvtrksopu:174: yad api svasaṃvedanaṃ nābhyupagamyate parais cittacaittānāṃ tad api ayuktam /
XXvtrksopu:175: na tāvac cittacaittānāṃ prakāśo nāsty eva /
XXvtrksopu:178: tad dhi paraṃ samānakālabhāvi tāvat prakāśakam anupapannam upakārābhāvāt /
XXvtrksopu:180: tasmād yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśakasvabhāvatvād ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānam apīti /
XXvtrksopu:181: nanu pradīpo 'pi cakṣuṣā prakāśyata iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:190: avyaktavyaktikaś ca jñānaparokṣatve ghaṭādir artha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:194: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa vyakter hetur ayam asiddha iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:197: na ca bhavatām api sarvaṃ vijñānam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena jñāyate /
XXvtrksopu:200: tata upekṣaṇīyam eva tāvad avyaktavyaktikatvād avyaktaṃ prasajyate /
XXvtrksopu:202: jñānaṃ jñānasyāpi kathaṃ vyaktir iti vaktavyam /
XXvtrksopu:203: anyajñānena tasya siddhatvād ucyamānāyāṃ tatrāpy evam ity anavasthā syāt /
XXvtrksopu:205: tathāhi yady avyaktavyaktikam api vyaktavyavahāraviṣayaḥ syāt tadā puruṣāntaravartijñānam avyaktam api svajñānodayakālavat tathaiva vyaktaṃ vyavahriyeteti /
XXvtrksopu:215: na cāviditam astīti so 'rtho 'yaṃ svasaṃvida // iti

XXvtrksopu:218: bhāvanā hi bhūtārthaviṣayā taditarā vā prakarṣaparyantavartinī sphuṭataragrāhyākāraṃ vijñānaṃ janayati /
XXvtrksopu:219: tathā hi śokādyupaplutacittavṛttayaḥ putrādibhāvanāsamāptau parisphuṭasamāvartitatpratibhāsavanto bhavanti /

XXvtrksopu:224: yaj jñānam avisamvādi tat pratyakṣam akalpakam iti //

XXvtrksopu:232: etasmāt svalakṣaṇād yad anyat sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ /

XXvtrksopu:237: yadi tad eva jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ neṣyate tadā bhinnaviṣayatvaṃ syāt pramāṇaphalayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:239: na hi paraśvādike khadiraprāpte palāśe cchidā bhavati //
XXvtrksopu:242: iha yasmād viṣayād vijñānam udeti tatsarūpaṃ tad bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:246: tadā nīlasyedaṃ vedanaṃ pītasyeti pratikarmavyavasthā na syāt
XXvtrksopu:247: / yādṛśaṃ hi tan nile pīte 'pi tādṛśaṃ ceti /
XXvtrksopu:248: arthasārūpye tu sati yasyaivākāram anukaroti jñānaṃ tatsaṃvedanaṃ bhavati nānyasya /
XXvtrksopu:249: tac cāsya sārūpyaṃ niyatārthapratītivyavasthāyāṃ sādhakatamatvāt pramāṇam /
XXvtrksopu:255: loko pi kadācid ekadhanurādikaṃ kartṛtvādinā vadaty eva /
XXvtrksopu:260: etena pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam uttaram uttaraṃ phalam iti pramāṇaphalabhrāntir apāstā tarkasopāne pratyakṣaparicchedaḥ prathamaḥ // //
XXvtrksopu:266: 2. tatra trirūpaliṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ rūpatrayayuktāl liṅgād yad anumeyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ utpadyate tat svārtham anumānam /
XXvtrksopu:272: yathākramam anumeye sattvasapakṣasattvavipakṣavyāvṛtti (Ts 286) mātram asti tathā hi dvidvirūpo yathānityo dhvaniḥ /
XXvtrksopu:282: pramāṇaphalavyavasthātrāpi pratyakṣavat ] yathā pratyakṣe tasyaiva nīlādisārūpyaṃ pramāṇam
XXvtrksopu:283: nīlādipratītiś ca phalaṃ tathātrāpi vahnyādyākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ vahnyādivikalpanarūpatā ca phalam iti /
XXvtrksopu:286: anumeye vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇe liṅgasya sattvam eva niścitam ekarūpam ] tatra sattvavacanenāsiddho nirastaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:291: pakṣīkṛteṣu taruṣu patrasaṃkocalakṣaṇaḥ svāpa ekadeśe na siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:292: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:295: anyathā hy anityaḥ srāvaṇatvād ity asyaiva hetutvaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:299: sapakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇas tasmin eva sattvaṃ niścitaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
XXvtrksopu:306: sa hi na sapakṣa eva vartate kiṃtūbhayatrāpi /
XXvtrksopu:311: vaktṛtvaṃ hi sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdham asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam ity atrāpi vartate
XXvtrksopu:313: tasminn asattvam eva niścitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ rūpam /
XXvtrksopu:319: prayatnānantariyakatve hi sādhye 'nityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vidyudādāv asti /
XXvtrksopu:323: vipakṣa eva yo nāsti sa hetuḥ /
XXvtrksopu:328: yathā devadattaputraḥ śyāmas tatputratvāt paridṛśyamānaputravad iti /
XXvtrksopu:330: nanu sapakṣe sattvam ity ukte sapakṣe sattvam eveti gamyate tat kim artham ubhayor upādānam
XXvtrksopu:332: kiṃtv anvayo vyatireko vā niyamavān eva prayoktavyo yenānvayaprayoge cānvayagatir iti /
XXvtrksopu:333: tena na dvayor upādānam ekatra prayoge kartavyam iti śikṣaṇārtham atrobhayor upādānaṃ kṛtam
XXvtrksopu:336: jijñāsitaviśeṣagrahaṇena cājñātaviśeṣatāmātram upalakṣyate anyathā hi vyāptismaraṇayuktasyāgnyādikaṃ paryeṣamāṇasya dhūmādidarśanamātrād eva naganitaṃbādau vahnyādipratītir yā sā na saṃgṛhitā syāt /
XXvtrksopu:337: sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ samānaḥ sadṛśo yo 'rthaḥ
XXvtrksopu:343: evaṃ hi pakṣeṇa sādṛśyaṃ sapakṣasya na pratipāditaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:349: 7. na sapakṣo 'sapakṣaḥ [ tato 'nyas tadviruddhas tadabhāvaś ca /
XXvtrksopu:355: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:358: avidyamāno 'py asāv atra yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhaved iti saṃbhavanaviṣaya
XXvtrksopu:362: na cātra pratiṣedhamātram anupalabdhiḥ tasya svayam asiddheḥ siddheś cānaṅgatvāt /
XXvtrksopu:368: 'nupalabdher lakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadā iha devadattopalambhād bahirabhāvas
XXvtrksopu:374: yadā tu kartṛdharmas tadā tadāśritaṃ jñānam /
XXvtrksopu:375: tatra yat tad ghaṭavaikalyaṃ tad bhūtalasya svarūpam eveti tadgrāhinā jñānena gṛhītam eveti
XXvtrksopu:376: tasmād iyam anupalabdhir mūḍham praty abhāvavyavahāram eva sādhayati /
XXvtrksopu:378: kāraṇānupalabdhyādayas tu parokṣe viṣaye pravartamānā abhāvaṃ sādhayanty eva /
XXvtrksopu:379: vartamānakālā ceyaṃ gamikā atītakālā cāsati smṛtimanaskārabhraṃśe /
XXvtrksopu:381: nāsīd iha ghaṭo 'nupalabdhād iti (Ts 290) śakyaṃ avasātum /
XXvtrksopu:382: na tu na bhaviṣyaty atra ghaṭo 'nupalapsyamānatvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:388: pratiṣedhyo hi dhūmas tasya yaḥ svabhāvas tasyānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:391: pratiṣedhyasya hi dhūmasya kāraṇaṃ vahnis tasyehānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:393: pratiṣedhyā hi śiṃśapā tasyāś ca vyāpako vṛkṣas tasyānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:394: 4) kāryānupalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni dhūmakāraṇāni santi dhūmābhāvad iti
XXvtrksopu:395: pratiṣedhyānāṃ dhūmakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehānupalabdhiḥ /

XXvtrksopu:399: 6) kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nāsya romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ santi saṃnihitadahanaviśeṣatvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:400: pratiṣedhyānāṃ romaharṣādiviṣesāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho dahanaviśeṣas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ

XXvtrksopu:403: 8) kāryaviruddhopalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni santi vahner iti /
XXvtrksopu:406: 9) svabhāvaviruddhavyāptopalabdhir yathā nātra vahnis tuṣārasparśād iti /
XXvtrksopu:407: pratiṣedhyasya vahner yaḥ svabhāvas tasya viruddhaṃ śītaṃ tena vyāptas tuṣārasparśas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:408: 10) kāraṇaviruddhavyāptopalabdhir yathā nātra dhūmas tuṣārasparśād iti /

XXvtrksopu:414: pratiṣedhyānāṃ hi vahnikāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ vahnis tasya viruddhaṃ śītaṃ tena vyāptas tuṣārasparśas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:417: pratiṣedhyasya hi śītasparśasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:418: 14) kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavān ayaṃ pradeśo dhūmād iti /
XXvtrksopu:419: pratiṣedhyānāṃ romaharṣādiviśeṣānāṃ kāraṇaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:423: pratiṣedhyasya tuṣārasparśasya vyāpakaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:426: pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ
XXvtrksopu:427: 10. ime sarve kāraṇānupalabdhyādayaḥ pañcadaśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṃgraham upayānti pāraṃparyeṇārthāntaravidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ prayogahhede 'pi
XXvtrksopu:431: tathā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādāv apy anupalabdhirūpatā vidyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:432: sahābhāvākṣepikā yasyopalabdhiḥ sā tasyānupalabdhir ity anupalabdhilakṣaṇayogāt /
XXvtrksopu:433: tathā hi yeyaṃ vahner upalabdhiḥ sā śītābhāvam ākṣipati /
XXvtrksopu:434: 11. bhavatv anupalabdhiḥ sā dṛśyatā tu katham /
XXvtrksopu:438: tathā hi yadi śītasparśo dṛśyo bhavet tadā tasyopalabdhiṃ niṣedhyābhāvavyāpto vahnir viruṇaddhy eva /
XXvtrksopu:442: yasyāṃ tv anupalabdhau tadaiva tam eva pratipattāraṃ prati dṛśyatvaṃ pratiṣedhyasya siddhaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhir eva tasyāḥ svalakṣaṇam iti sākṣāt svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:444: yady api saṃpratitanī dṛśyānupalabdhir nāsti virodhādikāle tv āsīd saiva bhāvapratipattinibandhanam iti /
XXvtrksopu:446: saṃpratitanyaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher abhāvāt tatsvabhāvānupalabdher anyāsām anupalabdhīnāṃ bheda iti /
XXvtrksopu:447: 12. yad api kaiścit svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādīnām anumitānumānatayā dṛśyānupalabdhirūpatocyate
XXvtrksopu:448: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣṇasparśaviśeṣas taddeśavyāpako 'numīyate tasmāc ca śītasparśābhāvapratītiḥ
XXvtrksopu:449: āhatya tu dṛśyānupalabdher anudayād dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena nirdeśaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:450: ata eva cānumitānumānam etat kevalam atyantābhyāsāj jhaṭiti tathābhūtapratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam ucyate /
XXvtrksopu:451: vastutas tv anekam anumānam etat evam anyatrāpi vyāpakaviruddhopalambhādāv ūhyam iti dvayam apy etan na manasi toṣam ādadhāti //
XXvtrksopu:453: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno na hetusattāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dhetum apekṣate /
XXvtrksopu:455: anena ca viśeṣaṇe nāntyāt kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yad utpadyate tasya saṃgrahaḥ (Ts 294) kṛtaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:456: tad api hi tasya svabhāva eva /
XXvtrksopu:458: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā /
XXvtrksopu:459: pare hi paścātkālabhāvinam api kṛtakatvādidharmaṃ svabhāvam icchantīti /
XXvtrksopu:461: kāryaṃ yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi kāraṇe hetur iti prakṛtam /
XXvtrksopu:462: kāraṇe sādhye yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi tair eva hetuḥ /
XXvtrksopu:466: / sādhyaś ca vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā anyonyalakṣaṇavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvād
XXvtrksopu:470: arthāntare tu gamye kāryam iti dvāv etau vidhisādhanau /
XXvtrksopu:473: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet /
XXvtrksopu:475: nanu svabhāvapratibandham antareṇāpi candrodayāt kumudavikāsapratipattiḥ samudravṛddhiś ca
XXvtrksopu:478: tat katham ucyate svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:482: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥsa tarn apratibaddhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na na vyabhicaratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:487: vāyuviśeṣa eva ca yaḥ kṛttikādyudayakāraṇaṃsa eva hi saṃtatyā rohiṇyādyudayakāraṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:500: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:509: pūrvam uktaṃ yat trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya yat prakāśakaṃ vacanaṃ tat parārtham anumānaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /
XXvtrksopu:518: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā tasya bhāvo vaidharmyam /
XXvtrksopu:521: yasya ca vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
XXvtrksopu:522: nanu ca sādharmyavati sādhanavākye vyatireko nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:523: vaidharmyavati cānvayas tat kathaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:527: sādharmyābhidheyena yukte prayoge samarthyād vyatirekasya pratītis tasmāt trirūpaliṅgākhyānam
XXvtrksopu:528: tasmin vyatireke buddhyāvasīyamāne 'sati sādhyena hetor anvayasya
XXvtrksopu:533: tatheti yathānvayavākye tathārthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ
XXvtrksopu:534: asati tasminn anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
XXvtrksopu:535: tasmād ekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bḥavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ
XXvtrksopu:536: 4. tatrānupalabdheḥ sādharmyavān prayogaḥ yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:538: nopalabhyate ca kvacitpradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti /
XXvtrksopu:539: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ śaśaśirasaḥ sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptapratiṣedhyānupalambhahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:541: yat sat tat sarvam anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃś ca śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:548: sā ca bhāvasyātmabhūtaiva kevalaṃ kalpanayā vyatirekiṇīva pradarśyate /
XXvtrksopu:549: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:550: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtaka iti /
XXvtrksopu:552: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmibhiḥ sādhyadharmiṇāṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:553: sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ (Ts 298) pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:558: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatra vahnir yathā mahānase /
XXvtrksopu:560: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo mahānasasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasya dhūmahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:561: ihāpi tribhir anupalambhair dvābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhave kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:566: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo nilaviśeṣasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaniṣedhyānupalambhākhyahetukṛtaṃ vaisādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:567: 7. svabhāvahetor vaidharmyavantaḥ prayogāḥ asaty anityatve nāsti kvacit sattvaṃ yathā gaganamaline
XXvtrksopu:569: asaty anityatve na kvacid utpattimattvaṃ yathākāśe /
XXvtrksopu:571: asaty anityatve na kvacit kṛtakatvaṃ yathā kurmaromni /
XXvtrksopu:573: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:575: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā mahāhrade /
XXvtrksopu:577: (Ts 299) atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:578: 9. trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānam ity arthān na pakṣādivacanam anumānam uktaṃ bhavati
XXvtrksopu:579: tatra pratijñā tāvan na sākṣāt sādhanam /
XXvtrksopu:581: artha eva hy arthaṃ gamayati pratibandhān /
XXvtrksopu:585: sādhyasādhanadharmaviśeṣopadarśanārtham anavayavabhūtāpi pratijñā dṛṣṭāntavat prayujyata iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:587: evaṃ hy anujñādivākyam api prayoktavyaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:588: na hi tair vinā eva sādhanasya pravṛttir saṃbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:591: tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabda ity etāvanmātre prayukte
XXvtrksopu:592: 'nityaḥ śabda iti pratītir bhavaty evāntareṇa pratijñāvacanam /
XXvtrksopu:596: asati hi pratijñānirdeśe pakṣāpekṣānibandhanaṃ trairūpyaṃ nāstīti /
XXvtrksopu:598: tathā hi pratijñāvacanam antareṇāpi sarvaṃ saṃpadyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:599: upanayanasya punar arthaḥ pakṣadharmavacanenaiva nirdiṣṭa iti na tatpūrvake tasya kaścid upayogaḥ
XXvtrksopu:600: vyāptipūrvake vacane pakṣadharmavacanād eva tadarthasiddheḥ kim anenopanayena /
XXvtrksopu:610: asiddhau saṃdehe vā pratipādyasya pratipādakasya hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:611: 11. tatraikasya rūpasya dharmisaṃbandhasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:613: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādyasiddham /
XXvtrksopu:615: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhya utpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃvādino
XXvtrksopu:617: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat tathā hi parārtho hetūpanyāsaḥ
XXvtrksopu:618: parasya cāsata utpāda utpattimattvaṃ sataś ca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham iti /
XXvtrksopu:620: yathā bāspādibhāvena saṃdigdho bhūtasaṃghāto 'gnisiddhau bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥ
XXvtrksopu:622: yathā ceha nikūñjemayūraḥ kekāyitād iti tadāpātadeśavibhrame /
XXvtrksopu:623: āpātanam āpātas tasya kekāyitasyāpāta utpādas tasya deśas tasya vibhramo bhrāntiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:624: atha vā āpataty āgacchaty asmād ity āpātaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:627: yat punar ucyate 'nyair āpāta āgamanam iti tad ayuktam /
XXvtrksopu:635: tasmād yady ayam ātmā sarvagato na bhavet /
XXvtrksopu:636: kathaṃ dakṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa upalabhyante
XXvtrksopu:637: / ākāśavad iti dṛṣṭānte ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:638: sa ca yathā vikāriṇi puruṣa upalabhyate tathānyatrāpīti /
XXvtrksopu:639: syād eṣa hetur yadi bauddhasya sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam ātmanaḥ siddhaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:640: yāvad ātmaiva na siddhaḥ // tad evam asiddhaḥ ṣaṭprakāraḥ // // //
XXvtrksopu:642: yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe ca vartamānaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:647: nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād ity atra nityatve sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayor vartate /
XXvtrksopu:648: ekadeśe ca vartamāna ity atrāpi sapakṣavipakṣayor iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:650: na kevalaṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyāpi (Ts 302) prameyatvam anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:657: vidyuti vartamānatvād ākāśādāv avartamānatvāt sapakṣavyāpī tu bhavaty eva /
XXvtrksopu:669: asparśatvaṃ hi vipakṣaikadeśe buddhyādau sapakṣaikadeśe cākāśādau vartata ity ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ
XXvtrksopu:672: yathā sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ
XXvtrksopu:673: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:678: sapakṣe sattvasyāsapakṣe cāsattvasya yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ // dvayor upādānam asapakṣavyāpyasapakṣaikadeśavṛttitvena bhedāt anayoḥ (Ts 303) sapakṣe
XXvtrksopu:680: etau sādhyaviparyayasādhanād viruddhau // dvayo rūpayor ekasyāsiddhāv aparasya ca saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:685: yathā vītarāgaḥ sarvajño vā vaktṛtvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:688: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā saṃdigdham /
XXvtrksopu:691: na hi sātmakānatmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra praṇādir vartate /
XXvtrksopu:695: 15. evam eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor
XXvtrksopu:696: asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:701: tathā dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavam /
XXvtrksopu:703: tathā sapakṣe sattvasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cānaikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:704: evam ekaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa (Ts 304) uktaḥ
XXvtrksopu:705: / tathā dvayor dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau viruddho hetvābhāsa uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:706: asapakṣe sattvasya ca saṃdehe vā 'naikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:707: tathā sapakṣāsapakṣayor api hetoḥ sadasattvasaṃdehe 'naikāntika eva /
XXvtrksopu:708: evaṃ dvayor dvayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca viruddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa iti
XXvtrksopu:709: 16. nanu katham uktaṃ trayo hetvābhāsā iti /
XXvtrksopu:710: yāvatā vaiphalyam api hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇam asti /
XXvtrksopu:712: sādhanaṃ yad vivādena nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate /
XXvtrksopu:713: kiṃ sādhyam anyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā // iti atra kecid āhuḥ satyam asty eva vaiphalyaṃ hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:714: yat punar asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikakathanaṃ viniścayādau tad asāmarthyaprabhedena /
XXvtrksopu:719: syād etad yadi vaiyarthyaṃ nāma hetor dūṣaṇaṃ syāt kiṃ tu pramāṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:721: adhigatam api gamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syād iti /
XXvtrksopu:724: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim itīṣyata iti tataś ca katham idaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇam /
XXvtrksopu:725: (Ts 305) athaivam ucyate pramāṇājanakatvād dhetur api vyartha ucyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:726: evaṃ hi vāstavam idaṃ hetor na dūṣaṇaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:729: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣanaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:733: tathā vaiyarthyapratipakṣeṇāpy anyad rūpam uktaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:735: yadi tarhīdaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ na pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ tarhy anena vādī nigṛhyate //
XXvtrksopu:743: nedaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tu parārthānumāne vaktur api guṇadoṣāś cintyante iti viphalābhidhāyī apratibhayaiva nigṛhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:744: tathā hi prakṛtam eva sādhyaṃ nāprakṛtam iti sādhyatāyāḥ prakṛter niyāmaka eṣa panthā /
XXvtrksopu:746: doṣāḥ punar nyūnatvam asiddhir vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭasyārthasya viparyayasādhanam aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ceti /
XXvtrksopu:747: atra ca yac codyaṃ parihāraśca tad granthavistarabhayān na likhitam iti /
XXvtrksopu:748: sthitam etad (Ts 306) yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddha evāntarbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:750: 18. triIakṣaṇo hetur uktas tāvatārthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma
XXvtrksopu:752: tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt /
XXvtrksopu:753: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena i punar aviśeṣeṇa kāryasvabhāvayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv uktau /
XXvtrksopu:755: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam iti sādhyenānugatam idam ekaṃ rūpam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttir iti sādhyanivṛttyā nivṛttir asya dvitīyaṃ rūpam uktam /
XXvtrksopu:759: tac ca darśayatā dhūmas tatrāgnir iti asaty agnau na kvacid dhumo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:760: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvam anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvāsaṃbhavo yathā ghaṭākāśayor iti darśanīyam
XXvtrksopu:761: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayituṃ /
XXvtrksopu:763: tasyāgnyādeḥ kāryaṃ tatkāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tatkāryatā /
XXvtrksopu:764: na hy anyathā śakyo darśayitum iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam //
XXvtrksopu:765: 19. asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:768: etenaiveti hetulakṣaṇābhidhānenaiva dṛṣṭāntasyāpi sāmarthyād gatārthatvena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā (Ts 307) api sādhanatvena pratyākhyātā bhavanti /
XXvtrksopu:769: yena hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yathoktaṃ pradarśyate sa saṃyagdṛṣṭāntaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:770: yena punas tasya lakṣaṇadvayaṃ na pradarśyate so dṛṣṭāntābhāsa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:774: atra hi karmaṇi nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmo nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:789: rathyāpuruṣe vacanaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścitam iti sādhanadharmas tatra siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:793: rathyāpuruṣe maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyadharma utpattimattvādinā liṅgena niścitaṃ rāgādimattvaṃ tv aniścitam iti saṃdigdhasādhanadharmā /
XXvtrksopu:797: yatra sādhyena hetor vyāptir nāsti so 'nanvayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:800: na hi rāgādīnāṃ vacanasya tādātmyalakṣaṇas tadutpattilakṣano vā pratibandho 'sti yenātrānvayaḥ
XXvtrksopu:805: na tu vacanenākhyāta ity avidyamāna ivāsau /
XXvtrksopu:809: atra hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity anvaye vaktavye yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti viparītam anvayaṃ karoti sarva ete dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sādharmyeṇa //
XXvtrksopu:829: saṃdigdhasādhanvyatirekaḥ yathā na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāt /
XXvtrksopu:831: ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantas tad yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:843: yatra vītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
XXvtrksopu:845: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:847: yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśavad iti vaidharmyeṇa /
XXvtrksopu:848: yo hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge vaidharmyeṇākāśavad iti brūyāt tena vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko na pradarśitaḥ
XXvtrksopu:850: yadāśeṣapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvo yathākāśavad iti karoti tadā vyatireko darśito bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:854: atra hi yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakam iti vaktavye /
XXvtrksopu:855: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam iti vadati //
XXvtrksopu:856: 21. na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam
XXvtrksopu:857: asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
XXvtrksopu:858: ebhiḥ sādhyavikalair dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tadarthāpattyaiṣāṃ nirāso veditavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:859: yasmād ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair dvividham api lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
XXvtrksopu:865: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ca gṛhyante ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt
XXvtrksopu:866: anena ca yad ahrīkeṇoktaṃ viparyayasādhanam eva dūṣaṇaṃ nānyad iti tad api parāstaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ
XXvtrksopu:870: niścayābhāvo vā bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:876: yat tarkasopānam idaṃ vidhāya puṇyaṃ mayāptaṃ śaradinduśubhram /
XXvtrksopu:877: tenottamāṃ bodhim ahaṃ labheya lokaś ca niryātu bhavād aśeṣaḥ //
